title: leaver buster and crashing....
body: Sooo My game crashed while I was loading logging back in it was asking me to repair so they remade the game and my account went to lower priority Q which is pretty lame tbh is there anyway to get this looked into ?

replies.body: I'm not sure I understand what specifically like you'd like to be looked into. Can you clarify?
He wants it to be fixed, leaver buster unfairly punished another player.
